EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Cloud Native Roadshow_2017.Detroit Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you Monday at the Cloud-Native Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are looking forward to seeing you tomorrow in Detroit at the Cloud-Native Roadshow. Please review the event details below and feel free to email the team at cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io <[[mailto:cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io]]> with any questions.
Date: Monday, May 15, 2017
Time: 8:30am - 3:45pm
Location: TechTown 440 Burroughs St, Detroit, MI 48202 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/440+Burroughs+St,+Detroit,+MI+48202/@42.3650554,-83.0752146,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m5!3m4!1s0x8824d29939ecebdb:0x2fb87bef73266577!8m2!3d42.3650554!4d-83.0730259?hl=en]]>)
Agenda:
8:30am - 9:30am Registration & Breakfast 9:30am - 12:00pm Sessions 12:00pm - 1:00pm Lunch 12:40pm - 1:00pm Presentations by our Ecosystem Partners 1:00pm - 3:45pm Sessions
Review the full agenda HERE <[[pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/detroit?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-roadshow-2017]]>.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
